ctx: intros n m A B H1.
intros n m A B H1.
exceptions.tactic: apply impTrans with (f := iffH A B).
exceptions.exn: In environment Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A n, m : nat A, B : Formula H1 : SysPrf NN (iffH A B) Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : folProof.Prf LNN Axm (impH (iffH A B) ?M1512)), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) ?M1509 g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : folProof.Prf LNN Axm (iffH (addExists m n A) (addExists m n B))), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) NN g".

ctx: intros n m A B H1.
exceptions.tactic: apply RepresentableHalf1Alternate with (n := m + n) (f := addExists m n) (A := A) (B := B).
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) f : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN n, m : nat A, B : Formula x : fol.Formulas LNN x0 : folProof.Prf LNN x (iffH A B) H1 : forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) NN g The term "addExists m n" has type "Formula -> Formula" while it is expected to have type "naryFunc (m + n)".

ctx: intros n m A B H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment H3 : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (impH A B) -> RepresentableHalf1 T n f B -> RepresentableHalf1 T n f A H2 : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) f0 : nat -> nat -> Formula -> Formula f : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN n, m : nat A, B : Formula x : fol.Formulas LNN x0 : folProof.Prf LNN x (iffH A B) H1 : forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) NN g H0 : fol.Formula LNN Unable to unify "Ensembles.Union (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Singleton (fol.Formula LNN) NN1) NN2) NN3) NN4) NN5) NN6) NN7) NN8) (Ensembles.Singleton (fol.Formula LNN) NN9) ?M4847" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : folProof.Prf LNN Axm (f (f0 m n A) (f0 m n B))), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) NN g".

ctx: intros n m A B H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment f1 : nat -> nat -> Formula -> Formula H8 : forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (impH A B) -> SysPrf NN (impH (f1 m n A) (f1 m n B)) H3 : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (impH A B) -> RepresentableHalf1 T n f B -> RepresentableHalf1 T n f A H2 : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) f0 : nat -> nat -> Formula -> Formula f : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN n, m : nat A, B : Formula x : fol.Formulas LNN x0 : folProof.Prf LNN x (iffH A B) H1 : forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) NN g H0, H4 : fol.Formula LNN H7 : Formula H : fol.Formula LNN Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : folProof.Prf LNN Axm (impH ?M8243 ?M8245)), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) ?M8242 g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : folProof.Prf LNN Axm (f (f0 m n A) (f0 m n B))), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) NN g".

original: intros n m A B H1. intros H2. apply impTrans with (f := iffH A B). - apply RepresentableHalf1Alternate with (n := m + n) (f := addExists m n) (A := A) (B := B). + apply H1. + apply H2. - apply reduceAddExistsOneWay. apply H2.
